### Wharf Construction at Ingonish (MacLeod's Point)

#### Solicitation Reference Number

WS4089127738-DOC4089178507

#### Tender Status

This tender is no longer active, having expired on **July 25, 2023, at 14:00:00**.

#### Contract Summary

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites contractors to submit tenders for the construction of a wharf at Ingonish (MacLeod's Point). The work involves partial demolition of an existing timber crib and timber piled wharf, removal and reinstallation of core stone, coarse core stone, and armour stone, upgrading the electrical power distribution and lighting system, and the installation of a new "Berlin Wall"-type structure.

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

* Partial demolition of an existing timber crib and timber piled wharf
* Removal and reinstallation of core stone, coarse core stone, and armour stone
* Upgrades to the electrical power distribution and lighting system
* Installation of a new "Berlin Wall"-type structure
* Widening the stem
* Raising the deck elevation
* Encapsulation of the remaining cribs with a "Berlin Wall"-type structure including deadman anchor system

#### Tender Details

* Tender closing date: July 25, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Tender status: expired
* Expected contract start date: August 30, 2023
* Expected contract end date: August 30, 2024

#### Contact Information

Further information regarding this tender can be found on the *Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) website*. For inquiries, please contact Grant Stewart at *stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca*.

#### Contract Details

* ENgro Category: Construction
* Category CNST
* Trade Agreement Alignment CFTA

#### Regions of Delivery

The contract will be delivered in Nova Scotia. 

#### Regions of Opportunity

This tender opportunity is open to selected companies. Please contact the contact above for more information.
